minizip v1.2 commit-0351dc781da507

Fixed CMakeLists.txt with following to support work on Android:
```cmake
if(CMAKE_C_COMPILER MATCHES ".*clang")
  # if(NOT CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Android")
  if(NOT ANDROID)  # enabled on non Android
      set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -msse3 -msse4.1 -maes")
      # set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -msse3 -msse4.1 -maes")
  endif()
endif()
```
